EmailTemplate.name: (smi) Swap Missing Item
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
It appears you’ve shipped us your [MISSING ITEM]. Can you please check if the [MISSING ITEM] in your possession has a Borrowlenses barcode on it?
If so, we can handle it 2 ways:
1. We can ship each item back to its original owner. Return shipping costs are $8-$10. 2. We can swap items, so you keep ours and we keep yours. Includes a $5 (not including tax) re-barcoding fee.
If you’d like to swap, please confirm your card on file is OK to charge the re-barcoding fee. Then, please remove the barcode on your item to prevent any mix-ups in the future.
If you’d like us to ship back your gear, please confirm your card on file is OK to charge for shipping (approx $8-$10) and let us know your return address and whether you’d like a signature required for delivery. Then, send back our missing item and email us the tracking number.
Here are our return addresses:
BorrowLenses.com "MISSING ITEMS" Order # 1664 Industrial Road San Carlos, Ca 94070
or
BorrowLenses.com "MISSING ITEMS" Order # 411 Waverly Oaks Rd. STE #113 Waltham, MA 02452
Please let me know which option you’d like to move forward with, or if you have any other questions.
Thanks,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} Asset Recovery Department 844-8-LENSES (844-853-6737) x5
